settings.hero_heading: Ready to Bring Your Vision to Life?
settings.hero_subtitle: Custom laser engraving for every occasion. From personal gifts to corporate orders.
settings.form_description: Have a question about custom orders, bulk pricing, or something else? We'd love to hear from you.
settings.faq_subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about our products and services.
settings.faq_1_answer: We work with wood, acrylic, leather, glass, slate, metal, and more. Each material creates unique effects perfect for different applications.
settings.faq_2_question: How long does a custom order take?
settings.faq_2_answer: Most custom orders are completed within 3-5 business days. Rush orders may be available - just ask when you contact us!
settings.faq_3_question: Do you offer bulk or corporate discounts?
settings.faq_3_answer: Yes! We offer tiered pricing for bulk orders and special rates for corporate clients. Contact us for a custom quote.
